PERSONA:
meet robert, a 68-year-old married white man from a metropolitan area in the south atlantic region. he is a high school graduate with a conservative political ideology and a devout member of the protestant faith, attending religious services more than once a week.

robert was born and raised in the united states, and he takes great pride in his american citizenship. he is a registered republican voter and aligns himself with the party's conservative values. despite his age, robert is tech-savvy and uses the internet several times a day to stay informed and connected.

with a family income between $50,000 and $60,000, robert falls into the middle-income tier. he is an active member of his community, engaging in volunteer work regularly. robert's strong religious beliefs and conservative values shape his worldview, and he is passionate about upholding traditional family values.

in his leisure time, robert enjoys spending quality time with his wife and engaging in activities that align with his faith and values. he is deeply rooted in his community and takes an active interest in local and national politics, always staying informed and participating in the democratic process.
